analyzed: megha sūtram
namaḥ acintya sāgarebhyaḥ sarva samyaksaṃbuddhebhyaḥ

original: evaṃ mayā śrutamekasmin samaye bhagavān nandopanandanāgarājabhavane viharati sma |
analyzed: evam mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān nanda upananda nāga rāja bhavane viharati sma

original: śrīmaṇiratnagarbhamahāmeghamaṇḍalakūṭāgāre mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ mahatā ca bodhisattvasaṃghena sārdhaṃ mahatā ca rājagaṇena sārdhaṃ  #
analyzed: śrī maṇi ratna garbha mahā megha maṇḍala kūṭāgāre mahatā bhikṣu saṃghena sārdham mahatā ca bodhisattva saṃghena sārdham mahatā ca rāja gaṇena sārdham

original: tadyathā nandena ca nāgarājena upanandena ca nāgarājena sāgareṇa ca anavataptena ca manasvinā ca varuṇena ca takṣakena ca ghṛtarāṣṭreṇa ca vāsukinā  #
analyzed: tat yathā nandena ca nāga rājena upanandena ca nāga rājena sāgareṇa ca anavataptena ca manasvinā ca varuṇena ca takṣakena ca ghṛtarāṣṭreṇa ca vāsukinā

original: tena khalu punaḥ samayena sarve te nāgarājāḥ saparivārā utthāyāsanebhya ekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgāni kṛtvā dakṣiṇāni jānumaṇḍalāni pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya  #
analyzed: tena khalu punar samayena sarve te nāga rājāḥ sa parivārāḥ utthāya āsanebhyaḥ eka aṃsam uttarāsaṅgāni kṛtvā dakṣiṇāni jānu maṇḍalāni pṛthivyām pratiṣṭhāpya

yena bhagavān tena añjalim praṇamya aprameya asaṅkheyaiḥ parama vividha ruciraiḥ puṣpa dhūpa gandha mālya vilepana cūrṇa cīvara chatra dhvaja patākā paṭṭa dāma vādya tūrya tāḍāva cara saṅgīti ratna kusuma ratna dāma muktā hāra nāgapuṣpa muktā jālaiḥ ggarñjantaḥ

original: guḍuguḍāyamānā mahāvātaṃ pravāyanto mahānādaṃ nadanto ramaṇīyāṃśca dharmmanādānnadantaḥ mahatāgurugoravacitrīkāreṇa bhagavantamabhicchādayantaḥ  #
analyzed: guḍuguḍāyamānāḥ mahā vātam pravāyantaḥ mahā nādam nadantaḥ ramaṇīyān ca dharmma nādān nadantaḥ mahatā aguru gorava citrīkāreṇa bhagavantam abhicchādayantaḥ  /

ekānta sthitāḥ praṇidhānāni kurvvanti sma
sarva lokadhātu samudra paramāṇu rajaḥ samaiḥ kāya samudraiḥ sarva buddha bodhisatva parṣad maṇḍala samudreṣu
sarvva loka ghātu prasara samudreṣu
sarvva pṛthivī ap tejaḥ vāyu paramāṇurajaḥ sarvva rūpa avabhāsa sama paramāṇurajaḥsu ekaikasmin paramāṇurajasi
sarvva gaṇanā samudra samatikrāntaiḥ asaṅkheya aprameya acintya atulya amāpya anabhijñāpya samatikrāntaiḥ kāya megha samudraiḥ ekaikasmin kāye aprameya asaṅkheyān
samudra meghān aghiṣṭhāya samanta diś śrotaḥ abhimukhāt ekaikasmāt paramāṇu rajaḥ bhāgāt samanta diś kūla spharaṇaiḥ asambhinnaiḥ sarva pūjā megha samudraiḥ sarva buddha boghisatva samudrān
satkuryāmaḥ gurukuryāmaḥ mānayemaḥ pūjayemaḥ
yat uta aprameya asaṅkheya acintya atulya amāpya aparināṇa anabhijñāpyaiḥ asambhinnaiḥ samantabhadra caryā prabhāva samudra meghaiḥ sañchannam gagana talam aghiṣṭhāya
yathā yathā bodhisattva ātmabhāva samudra meghaiḥ
evam sarvva ratna varṇa raśmi ghana sarvva sūrya candra ātmabhāva maṇḍala samudra meghaiḥ
sarvva ratna hāra kusuma samudra meghaiḥ
sarvva ratna avabhāsa garbha kūṭāgāra samudra meghaiḥ
sarvva cūrṇa vṛkṣa kośa samudra meghaiḥ
sarvva gandha dhūpa sarvva rūpa sandarśana samudra meghaiḥ
sarvva ruta nigarjita vādya samudra meghaiḥ
sarva gandha vṛkṣa samudra meghaiḥ
sañchannam aṅgagana talam aghiṣṭhāya
evampramukhaiḥ aprameya asaṃkhya acintya atulya amāpya aparimāṇīya anabhijñāpyaiḥ asambhinnaiḥ sarvva pūjā megha samudraiḥ
sarvva buddha bodhisatvān satkuryāmaḥ gurukuryāmaḥ mānayemaḥ pūjayemaḥ

original: evaṃrūpaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtvā te nāgarājānaḥ punarapi bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya pādābhivandanāñca kṛtvā |

tena khalu punar samayena ananta parikara sāgara megha vyūha tejaḥ maṇḍala chatra ākāra rājaḥ tri sāhasra mahā sāhasrikaḥ mahā nāga adhipatiḥ

original: utthāyāsanād ekāṃsaṃ uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat
analyzed: utthāya āsanāt eka aṃsam uttarāsaṃgam kṛtvā dakṣiṇam jānu maṇḍalam pṛthivyām pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavān tena añjalim praṇamya bhagavantam etat avocat

original: pṛccheyamahaṃ bhagavantaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksambuddhaṃ kiñcideva pradeśapraśnaṃ ,
analyzed: pṛccheyam aham bhagavantam tathāgatam arhantam samyaksambuddham kiñcid eva pradeśa praśnam
saced me bhagavān avakāśam kuryāt pṛṣṭaḥ praśna vyākaraṇāya
evam ukte bhagavān ananta parikara sāgara megha vyūha tejaḥ maṇḍala chatra ākāra rājam nāga adhipatim etat avocat

original: pṛccha tvaṃ bhujaṅgādhipate yadyadevākāṅghasyahaṃ te tasya tasyaiva praśnavyākaraṇena cittamārādhayiṣye |
analyzed: pṛccha tvam bhujaṅga adhipate yat yat eva ākāṅghasi aham te tasya tasya eva praśna vyākaraṇena cittam ārādhayiṣye
evam ukte ananta parikara chatra ākāra rāja tri sāhasra mahā sahasrikaḥ mahā nāga adhipatiḥ bhagavantam etat avocat

original: sarvanāgānāṃ sarvanāgaduḥkhāni pratipraśrambheyuḥ praharṣitāḥ sukhasamanvitāśceha jambudvīpakālānukālaṃ varṣadhārā utsṛjeyuḥ |
analyzed: sarva nāgānām sarva nāga duḥkhāni pratipraśrambheyuḥ praharṣitāḥ sukha samanvitāḥ ca iha jambudvīpa kāla anukālam varṣa dhārāḥ utsṛjeyuḥ

sarva rasān saṃjanayeyuḥ
yena jāmbudvīpakāḥ manuṣyāḥ sukha samarppitāḥ bhaveyuḥ
evam ukte bhagavān ananta parikara rājam trisāha mahā nāga adhipatim etat avocat

original: sādhu sādhu bhujaṅgādhipate yattvaṃ sarvvasatvānāṃ hitasukhāya pratipannaḥ tathāgatametadarthaṃ paripraṣṭavyaṃ manyase |

original: tena hi bhujaṅgādhipate śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru |

original: tāni sarvvanāgānāṃ sarvanāgakulānāṃ sarvanāgagotrāṇāṃ sarvanāgasambhavānāṃ sarvanāgayonīnāṃ sarvanāgarājānāṃ sarvanāgakulodbhavameghavirājitakanyānāṃ  #

sarva sukha upadhānāni upasaṃharanti

namaḥ bhagavate nāga kula udbhava megha virājitāya

original: ebhirbhujagādhipate tathāgatanāmabhiḥ pravarttitaiḥ sarvanāgānāṃ sarvaduḥkhāni pratipraśrabdhāni sarvaduḥkhasamarppitāśca kālena kālamiha jambudvīpe  #
analyzed: ebhiḥ bhujaga adhipate tathāgata nāmabhiḥ pravarttitaiḥ sarva nāgānām sarva duḥkhāni pratipraśrabdhāni sarva duḥkha samarppitāḥ ca kālena kālam iha jambudvīpe
varṣa dhārāḥ utsṛjanti sarva tṛṇa gulma ośadhī vanaspati śasyāni ca virohanti
atha khalu ananta parikara nāga adhipatiḥ bhagavantam adhyeṣate sma

original: bhāṣatu bhagavāṃstādṛśāni dhāraṇīmantrapadāni yairiha jambudvīpe paścime kāle paścime samaye'nāvṛṣṭāvudīritairmahāvarṣadhārāḥ pravarṣeyuḥ |
analyzed: bhāṣatu bhagavān tādṛśāni dhāraṇī mantra padāni yaiḥ iha jambudvīpe paścime kāle paścime samaye anāvṛṣṭau udīritaiḥ mahā varṣa dhārāḥ pravarṣeyuḥ
dāruṇa kāla samaye kāntāra kāla samaye adhārmmika janapada kali kalaha kāla samaye īti upadrava kāla samaye roga maraṇa kāla samaye viṣama nakṣatra saṃsthāna kāla samaye
sarva iti upadrava pīḍā praśamanam kuryāt buddha adhiṣṭhānena adhitiṣṭhatu
bhagavān parama kāruṇikaḥ

original: sarvasatvānukampakaḥ tathārūpāṇi dhāraṇīmantrapadāni bhāṣatāṃ yāni sarvanāgān sañcodayeyuḥ |
analyzed: sarva satva anukampakaḥ tathārūpāṇi dhāraṇī mantra padāni bhāṣatām yāni sarva nāgān sañcodayeyuḥ
sarva devān praharṣayeyuḥ
sarva mārān vidhvaṃśayeyuḥ

original: sarvasattvānāṃ sarvaghātanāḥ satvabhayopadravapīḍāśca nivārayeyuḥ śāntisvastyayanaṃ ca kuryuḥ viṣamanakṣatrakṛtaṃ ca praśamayeyuḥ |
analyzed: sarva sattvānām sarva ghātanāḥ satva bhaya upadrava pīḍāḥ ca nivārayeyuḥ śānti svastyayanam ca kuryuḥ viṣama nakṣatra kṛtam ca praśamayeyuḥ

original: yañca varṣāntarāyāni yāni bhagavatoktāni sarvāṇi viṣkambhayeyuḥ |
analyzed: yat ca varṣa antarāyāni yāni bhagavatā uktāni sarvāṇi viṣkambhayeyuḥ
samyak varṣa dhārāḥ iha jambudvīpe utsṛjeyuḥ iti
aham bhagavantam tathāgatam adhyeṣayāmi

original: sādhu sādhu bhujagodhipate yattvaṃ tathāgatamadhyeṣasi sarvasattvānāmarthāya hitāya sukhāya |
analyzed: sādhu sādhu bhujaga udhipate yat tvam tathāgatam adhyeṣasi sarva sattvānām arthāya hitāya sukhāya

original: tena hi bhujagādhipate śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru bhāṣipye'haṃ te |
analyzed: tena hi bhujaga adhipate śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru bhāṣipye aham te
mahā karuṇā udbhava mahā megha nirnnāda vijṛmbhita sūraketu nāma dhāraṇī sarva buddha bhāṣita adhiṣṭhitā anumoditā sarva sattvānām arthāya sukhāya

analyzed: sarva mārān vidhvaṃsayati sarva sattvān sarva sukha samarpitān karoti tat yathā

original: sugandhigandhodvarttitena triśulkabhojinā ayaṃ mahāmeghamaṇḍalaḥ parivarttavyaḥ pūrvābhimukhena rātrindivamavyavacchinnaṃ vācayitavyaḥ |
analyzed: sugandhi gandha udvarttitena tri śulka bhojinā ayam mahā megha maṇḍalaḥ parivarttavyaḥ pūrva abhimukhena rātrindivam avyavacchinnam vācayitavyaḥ

original: tatra dharmmabhāṇakasya caturdiśaṃ gomayena rasena śara ālikhya pūrvasyāṃ diśi trihastamātreṇa triśīrṣako nāma nāgaparivāro gomayena nāgarāja  #
analyzed: tatra dharmma bhāṇakasya caturdiśam gomayena rasena śaraḥ ālikhya pūrvasyām diśi tri hasta mātreṇa triśīrṣakaḥ nāma nāga parivāraḥ gomayena nāga rāja
ālikhitavyaḥ

original: dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi pañcahastamātreṇa pañcaśīrṣako nāma nāgaparivāro nāgarāja ālikhitavyaḥ |
analyzed: dakṣiṇasyām diśi pañca hasta mātreṇa pañcaśīrṣakaḥ nāma nāga parivāraḥ nāga rājaḥ ālikhitavyaḥ

original: paścimāyāṃ diśi saptahastamātreṇa saptaśīrṣako nāma nāgaparivāro nāgarāja ālikhitavyaḥ |

original: dharmmabhāṇakena ca kṛtātmarakṣeṇa maitrīvihāriṇā sarvasattveṣūpasthātavyaṃ karuṇācittena sarvabuddhabodhisattvān āyācya nāgānāṃ svakuśalamūlena  #
